noun.description: A member of a people living in South Sulawesi, a province of the Indonesian island of Sulawesi; = Bugis.
The Malayo-Polynesian language of the Buginese; = Bugis.

adjective.description: Of or relating to the Buginese or their language; = Bugis.

origin: Early 19th century; earliest use found in Philosophical Magazine. From Bugi- + -nese, after Dutch Boeginees.
